text: Sergejs Šakurovs (born 25 April 1958) is a Latvian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Latvian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Soviet Union Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Riga
title: Sergejs Šakurovs
